0.name: Red powder
0.desc: Crafting material used to brew red potions.

1.name: Food
1.desc: Of no use to individuals, this is in contrast the most important resource for a settlement, allowing them to maintain food surplus and develop. Make sure to sell your food to your settlement! Food can be obtained from dead animals or gathered by specific resource buildings.

3.name: Timber
3.desc: Used by settlements to build new buildings.

4.name: Bomb
4.desc: [SOON] Can be used in battle for area-of-effect damage.

5.name: Root
5.desc: Crafting material used to brew red potions.

7.name: Wood
7.desc: Crafting material used to make wooden weapons or to make charcoal.

8.name: Thick Grass
8.desc: Crafting material used to make string.

9.name: Pelt
9.desc: Crafting material obtained from dead animals. Used to craft several pieces of equipment. Also very valuable to sell to settlements.

21.name: String
21.desc: Robust string made from plant fibers, primarily used to make bows.

22.name: Coal
22.desc: Crafting material that can be mined or obtained from wood. Can be used to heat furnaces, as an ingredient for antidotes or can be converted into carbon.

23.name: Carbon
23.desc: Crafting material obtained from coal. In combination with iron, it can be used to make steel.
